meanings.sent1: The apple was reddy and shiny.
meanings.sent2: The stop sign is always reddy.
meanings.sent3: The reddy balloon popped and painted the room red.
meanings.sent4: The reddy leaves danced in the autumn breeze.
meanings.sent5: The reddy sunset painted the sky in hues of crimson.

meanings.definition: To make something red in color.
meanings.sent1: She reddyed her lips with lipstick.
meanings.sent2: He reddyed the roses by adding food coloring to the water.
meanings.sent3: The artist reddyed the canvas with bold strokes.
meanings.sent4: The setting sun reddyed the clouds in the evening sky.
meanings.sent5: The chef reddyed the sauce with ripe tomatoes.
